story.storykicker: The Bar Council of India has declared the results of All India Bar Examination (AIBE) on its official website, check your results now.
story.storybody:
The Bar Council of India has declared the results of All India Bar Examination (AIBE) on its official website.

The candidates who appeared for the AIBE 9 examination can now check their scores on the official website.

The aspirants should perform the following steps to check their results:

  • Log on to the official website, the link for which is www. allindiabarexamination.com
  • Click on the live link 'Result (AIBE-9)'
  • When the new window opens, enter the requisite details like roll number and date of birth in the space provided and submit
  • The result would appear on the screen, the candidates should take a print out of the same for future reference.
The council has also released the list of candidates whose results have been withheld. The candidates can check their names on the official website, by clicking on the live link 'RESULT WITHHELD AIBE 9'

 

The PDF with roll number, registration number, candidate name and status will open in a new window. The candidates should check in the list if their name is mentioned, and the reason why their results have been withheld.

It is mentioned in a notification on the website, such candidates can send attested copies in JPEG format of all the documents required, along with their registration details.

The Bar Council of India had successfully conducted AIBE 9 on March 06, 2016.

 

For any query, the candidates should visit the official website.

For more updates, follow India Today Education.
